item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, December 10, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Israel draws furious reaction from Egypt after taking more Syrian territory
2. Syrian rebels seek to consolidate control
3. [Opinion] Europeans need to learn some lessons about power — and fast
4. Luigi Mangione charged with murder of US health insurance executive
5. The ‘Anti-Elon Tesla Club’: Musk’s politics gives some owners second thoughts
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, December 10, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
